name: It's No Monster, It's a God! (Skill Card)
text:
Kaiba / Skill
[ Skill Activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ Skill Effect ]
Activate this Skill during your Main Phase.
Discard any number of cards (min. 1), then add 1 "Obelisk the Tormentor" from your Deck or GY to your hand.
This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
